# XMLNode.Kind

**Enumeration**

`NSXMLNode` declares the following constants of type NSXMLNodeKind for specifying a node’s kind in the initializer methods [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/init(kind:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/init(kind:options:)]:

## Declaration

```swift
enum Kind
```

## Constants

- **XMLNode.Kind.invalid**: Indicates a node object created without a valid kind being specified (as returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/kind-swift.property] method).
- **XMLNode.Kind.document**: Specifies a document node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.element**: Specifies an element node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.attribute**: Specifies an attribute node
- **XMLNode.Kind.namespace**: Specifies a namespace node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.processingInstruction**: Specifies a processing-instruction node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.comment**: Specifies a comment node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.text**: Specifies a text node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.DTDKind**: Specifies a document-type declaration (DTD) node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.entityDeclaration**: Specifies an entity-declaration node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.attributeDeclaration**: Specifies an attribute-list declaration node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.elementDeclaration**: Specifies an element declaration node.
- **XMLNode.Kind.notationDeclaration**: Specifies a notation declaration node.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **XMLNode.Options**: These constants are input and output options for all `NSXMLNode` objects (unless otherwise indicated), including [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument] objects. You can specify these options in the `NSXMLNode` methods [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/init(kind:options:)] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/xmlString(options:)].

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
